name: SuitU
description:
Become an amazing stylist in this city. Show off your fashion styling and makeup skills in this dress-up fashion game.


Features
- Customize your makeup
DIY your own stunning makeup and show different yourself.

- Vote on the best refined
Compete for various challenges with all players, and vote on who wore it best.

- Play with friends
Wanna get advice and be friends with other players? Join the in-game loving community, and share your creative looks.

- Create your own story
Share your daily looks, OOTD, and more to express your ideas.

- Design your own style
Design your own style with outfits, hairstyles, makeup, accessories, and backgrounds from a huge library of options.
